turns.content:
What are the key findings of the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory study on the effects of wind turbine upsizing on community sound levels and power and energy density?

The study, published in Applied Energy, found that future wind turbines will be more powerful and efficient but also operate with higher sound emissions than those installed in the last decade. Due to their taller heights, larger rotors, and higher sound power levels, future wind turbines will require larger setbacks from homes and greater inter-turbine spacing, resulting in fewer turbines deployed for a given land area. However, despite fewer turbines, projects using future turbines result in higher installed capacities and annual energy output for a given land area. Additionally, community sound levels at homes are expected to be significantly lower in the future, despite overall louder turbines. Finally, the study finds consistent decreases in average estimated receptor sound pressure levels surrounding the projects in all periods.

Web search results:

[1] "Here are the key steps to writing a top-notch summary with ease: Read the article closes with an eye on its main focus; Make notes as you read to save yourself some time; Identify the key ideas or questions of the text; Keep an eye on the text's key arguments or methods (depending on the type of article you are reading); Make a list of ..."
URL: https://papersowl.com/blog/how-to-write-summary-of-article

[2] "QuillBot's summarizer is trusted by millions worldwide to condense long articles, papers, or documents into key summary paragraphs using state-of-the-art AI. QuillBot Summarize is an online summarization tool that allows you to take an article, paper, or document and condense it into the most important information at a click of a button."
URL: https://quillbot.com/summarize

[3] "Copy and paste the article you need summarized in the blank space below. Click on the button under the field and get your short summary in just a couple of seconds. Enjoy! Enter your text here. 16,000 characters left. Our team will write your customized paper in about 3 hours. Summarize."
URL: https://writing-services.org/essaytoolbox/article-summarizer

[4] "Identify important arguments. Use these to write the summary. Below shows you how to do this step-by-step. 1. Identify the Main Idea or Topic. The aim of an article is to convey a certain idea or topic through arguments and evidence. In a summary, you want to identify the main idea of the article and put this information into your own words."
URL: https://owlcation.com/academia/How-to-Write-a-Summary

[5] "When writing a summary, the goal is to compose a concise and objective overview of the original article. The summary should focus only on the article's main ideas and important details that support those ideas. Guidelines for summarizing an article: State the main ideas. Identify the most important details that support the main ideas."
URL: https://libguides.randolph.edu/summaries

[6] "Format your summary into sentences that make up paragraphs. Get started by writing down the main points of the text in your own words. Make sure to write down these main points as they were presented by the author of the text, meaning that you should write them in chronological order. 4. Add in supporting points."
URL: https://www.indeed.com/career-advice/resumes-cover-letters/examples-of-summaries

[7] "TLDR This is a Free online text summarizing tool that automatically condenses long articles, documents, essays, or papers into key summary paragraphs using state-of-the-art AI. 🚀 We just launched our new AI image and art generator (Photosonic) on Product Hunt. Check it out. Menu. ️ Paraphraser ..."
URL: https://tldrthis.com/

[8] "Summarize my text in sentences. SMMRY summarizes text to save you time. Paste an article, text or essay in this box and hit summarize; we'll return a shortened copy for you to read. You can also summarize PDF and TXT documents by uploading a file or summarize online articles and webpages by pasting the URL below..."
URL: https://smmry.com/

[9] "An abstract is a comprehensive summary that condenses your text to 250 words. Our tool allows you to generate abstracts for research papers or APA style essays. As you can see, the generator can assist you with a variety of tasks. Keep reading to learn all you need to make your summary perfect. 🤔 How to Create a Plagiarism-Free Summary"
URL: https://place4papers.com/writing-toolbox/online-summarizer

[10] "Just copy-paste the text in the empty field, press the button, and enjoy the result! Read the cut-down version. Once you've got the free summary of the article, carefully analyze it. Highlight the key takeaways to catch the general idea. Also, make sure that you understand what the author was trying to say. Explain the central idea in your ..."
URL: https://custom-writing.org/writing-tools/article-summarizer
Current date: 2023. 3. 27.

Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: make summury of this article
Reply in 한국어

좋은 요약을 작성하기 위한 핵심 단계는 다음과 같습니다[[1][4][5][6][10]]:

1. 주요 내용에 집중하여 글을 읽으세요.
2. 읽으면서 메모를 하여 시간을 절약하세요.
3. 글에서 주요 아이디어나 질문을 파악하세요.
4. 글의 중요한 주장이나 방법(글의 유형에 따라 다름)에 주목하세요.
5. 글에서 주요 아이디어나 주장을 지원하는 중요한 세부 사항을 나열하세요.
6. 글의 중심 내용을 파악하고 이를 본인의 말로 요약하세요.
7. 문서의 흐름에 따라 단락을 구성하여 요약을 작성하세요.

이러한 단계들을 수행하면서 글의 주요 내용과 중요한 세부 사항을 파악하고, 이를 요약하는 것이 좋습니다. 요약은 본문에서 다루는 주요 아이디어와 그에 대한 중요한 세부 사항만을 다루어야 하며, 이를 본인의 말로 간결하게 요약해야 합니다. 요약 작성을 위해 온라인 도구를 이용할 수도 있습니다[[2][3][7][8][9]].

하지만 주의해야 할 점은, 요약은 항상 출처를 밝혀야 한다는 것입니다. 따라서 요약을 작성할 때 출처를 명시하는 것이 중요합니다.
make sumurry of this article you read before
죄송합니다만, 저는 이전에 읽은 기사가 없기 때문에 답변을 제공할 수 없습니다. 다른 주제에 대해 질문이 있으시면 언제든지 물어보실 수 있습니다. 감사합니다.
